title: I did the first urf mission but didnt receive my icon to do other missions
body: So first off I did the first urf mission like right when it was released then i didnt get my icon and was wondering if you could provide me with the icon to do my other missions. Thanks

replies.body: It looks like those Arcade Poro icons had a bit of bug when they were first being sent out, and many players didn't get them so they couldn't continue the Arcade Event Missions. I do see yours on your profile now, so check again for me and let me know if you still don't see it.
